00011 #ifndef __HEAP_H_
00012 #define __HEAP_H_
00013 
00014 #if KERNEL_USE_HEAP
00015 
00016 #include "kernelcfg.h"
00017 #include "types.h"
00018 
00019 //---------------------------------------------------------------------------
00020 // If you change the number of block sizes, you must change this value, as well as 
00021 // add the additional information for the new sizes to the table below
00022 #define NUM_BLOCK_SIZES         (5)
00023 
00024 //---------------------------------------------------------------------------
00025 // Define the pool element sizes - this is arbitrary and can be set by the user.
00026 // Just make sure that these are defined in smallest-largest order.
00027 #define ELEMENT_SIZE_1          (8)
00028 #define ELEMENT_SIZE_2          (12)
00029 #define ELEMENT_SIZE_3          (16)
00030 #define ELEMENT_SIZE_4          (32)
00031 #define ELEMENT_SIZE_5          (64)
00032 
00033 //---------------------------------------------------------------------------
00034 // Define the block sizes - this is also arbitrary.
00035 #define NUM_BLOCK_1                     (10)
00036 #define NUM_BLOCK_2                     (6)
00037 #define NUM_BLOCK_3                     (4)
00038 #define NUM_BLOCK_4                     (2)
00039 #define NUM_BLOCK_5                     (1)
00040 
00041 //---------------------------------------------------------------------------
00042 // Define the number of elements in the heap
00043 #define HEAP_NUM_ELEMENTS       (NUM_BLOCK_1 + NUM_BLOCK_2 + NUM_BLOCK_3 + NUM_BLOCK_4 + NUM_BLOCK_5)
00044 
00045 //---------------------------------------------------------------------------
00046 // Compute the block sizes
00047 #define SIZE_BLOCK_1            (ELEMENT_SIZE_1 * NUM_BLOCK_1)
00048 #define SIZE_BLOCK_2            (ELEMENT_SIZE_2 * NUM_BLOCK_2)
00049 #define SIZE_BLOCK_3            (ELEMENT_SIZE_3 * NUM_BLOCK_3)
00050 #define SIZE_BLOCK_4            (ELEMENT_SIZE_4 * NUM_BLOCK_4)
00051 #define SIZE_BLOCK_5            (ELEMENT_SIZE_5 * NUM_BLOCK_5)
00052 
00053 //---------------------------------------------------------------------------
00054 // Define the size of the heap pool (in bytes)
00055 #define HEAP_SIZE_BYTES         (SIZE_BLOCK_1 + SIZE_BLOCK_2 + SIZE_BLOCK_3 +SIZE_BLOCK_4 + SIZE_BLOCK_5)
00056 
00057 //---------------------------------------------------------------------------
00059 typedef struct
00060 {
00061         USHORT usSize;          
00062         USHORT usOffset;        
00063         BOOL bInUse;            
00064 } HEAP_BLOCK_STRUCT;
00065 
00066 //---------------------------------------------------------------------------
00068 typedef struct
00069 {
00070         HEAP_BLOCK_STRUCT astHeapElements[HEAP_NUM_ELEMENTS];   
00071         UCHAR aucPool[HEAP_SIZE_BYTES];  
00072 } HEAP_STRUCT;
00073 
00074 //---------------------------------------------------------------------------
00075 typedef struct
00076 {
00077         USHORT usNumBlocks;     
00078         USHORT usBlockSize; 
00079 } HEAP_INIT_STRUCT;
00080 
00081 //---------------------------------------------------------------------------
00082 void Heap_Init(void);
00083 UCHAR *Heap_Alloc(USHORT usSize_);
00084 void Heap_Free(void *pvData_);
00085 
00086 #endif //KERNEL_USE_HEAP
00087 
00088 #endif //__HEAP_H_
